txt.en:
'Welcome to Alagrant, traveller. What is this, now?

'We are but a small village of hunters, friend. If Malthellam's concern is that the beasts have grown wild, I do not believe such a thing will trouble us.

'However, there is another matter which may....'
In an effort to prevent further tragedy from befalling the people of Blackroot Vale, Malthellam hopes to safe-guard the people of Alagrant and Sardol from the Enemy.

Calennen can be found in the village of Alagrant to the south-west of Morlad.\n\nMalthellam has asked you to scout for threats to the south and ensure the safety of the people in the villages of Alagrant and Sardol.

'After speaking with Rosfin, I have decided that our first course of action must be to protect the villages that still stand to the south.

'I do not know how far the Orcs have ventured into the vale, but I can only hope that our archers have deterred them from straying too far beyond Tingobel. To the south lie the villages of Alagrant and Sardol... small settlements full of fishermen and hunters. They must stop their hunts for a time if they are to remain safe.

'I would ask that you travel to both and warn them of danger. Meanwhile, Rosfin and I shall form a plan to deal with the Orcs.'
